DOC.brief_summary: To study the effectiveness of Healing Touch provided during chemotherapy infusions on the experience of women undergoing treatment for breast cancer. Healing Touch (HT) is a gentle, non-invasive form of energy-balancing work that promotes relaxation and can help manage the side effects of chemotherapy.
DOC.brief_title: Healing Touch During Chemotherapy Infusions for Women With Breast Cancer
DOC.criteria: Stage I or II breast cancer Postop On treatment protocol of eight weeks of AC given every other week followed by 8 weeks of paclitaxel given every other week ECOG Performance Status: 02 Speak and read English Previous chemotherapy exposure Concomitant energy work interventions (HT, Reiki, QiGong, acupuncture).
